attributes.action: To stop the government from  limiting social media for under 16
attributes.additional_details:
1.some social media is used for education 
2. It can also help with entertainment 
3. To be able to contact friends and family
attributes.background:
1.to continue letting under 16 to access social media 
2.not putting time limits on on social media for under 16

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for similar action: "Do not ban social media for under 16s" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/757233
